properties.propertyDescription: Global Park - It's a 2/3 bedroom flat with an adjoining hall. This unfurnished flat has a covered area of 1000 sq-Ft & has 2 bathrooms.Additionally, There is/are store room, Servant room. The flat has vitrified flooring. It overlooks garden/park and faces east direction. Among the facilities, There are 1 covered; 1 open car parkings, 2 lifts in the tower, 24 hours available water supply and no/rare powercut. The booking amount is rs 1,00,000. The maintenance charges of rs 1200 are paid monthly. The flat is approved by developer.

It is a east facing flat perfect from vastu luxarious and spacious apartment it is located in prime greenary loction & airy and breezy flat with all the amenities.Near bus stand market school & more. Beautiful view.Road touch for more details contact us.
